amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds for the enforcement of certain requirements with respect to certain roads.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3645 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3645 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator McConnell to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text: CR S5501) To prohibit the use of funds for the enforcement of certain requirements with respect to certain roads.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3645 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator McConnell to Amendment SA 3399.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3645 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
